      ObservableList of all existing appointments

    • retrieveAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> retrieveAppointments()
      Returns:
      Retrieves appointments from appointments table in the database and appends them to allAppointments list

    • getSelectedAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getSelectedAppointments(ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end)
      filters appointments based on given start and end time
      Parameters:
      start - ZonedDateTime start time value
      end - ZonedDateTime end time value
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments fitting between start and end

    • addNewAppointment

      public static void addNewAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Parameters:
      appointment - specified appointment is added to allAppointments list and added to database table appointments

    • updateApointment

      public static void updateApointment(int index, Appointment appointment) throws SQLException, ParseException
      Parameters:
      index - used to locate index of existing appointment
      appointment - appointment with desired values updates existing appointment at given index with desired values retrieved from appointment parameter
      Throws:
      SQLException
      ParseException
